roleset.name: clean, remove dirt
roleset.note: RINSE-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena based on ectb2. Member of VNcls wipe_manner-10.4.1-1, braid-41.2.2. (from rinse.01-v)

role.descr: dirt; thing being removed to make clean

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: And then I 'd pour it from the container into the plastic bag and seal it up and then go you know rinse out the container thing and wash it the next day .

example.name: all args
example.text: John rinsed the mud off his shoes.
